page.title: 12The end of a long tradition.
page.content: After nearly 300 years in the business {the oldest grocery shop in the county recently closed its doors thus bringing a long tradition of service to a close to the Stansted area. The shop opened in 1687 sold basic necessities such as herbs and spices,butter and cheese.It also sold some luxery items like tea and coffee. The shop prospered and by 1741 the shop was selling homemade candles and soap which were made in the shed at the back of the shop.By 1825 new lines appeared like wines and spirits and an undertaking service was introduced. Expansion led to the sales of sweets, bacon,feather dusters,glue,infact any- thing from "a pin to an elephant". {Compare these 1787 prices with today.. {TEA-1s.9d per lb. COFFEE-2s.4d per lb. {DRESS MATERIAL-1/2d per yard. HATS-1d. {SHOES-6d per pair.SWEETS-3d per lb.
